name: Robber Headshot - Bravo Killzone
description:
+++ 24-hour discount! 100% FREE! Are you the sniper champ? +++

“Cool Background”
“Exciting Multi Functionalities”
“Realistic Sound Effects”
___________________________________

It’s the time to save the Town from the robbers, this addictive iOS game will surely make you keep coming back and play more. You have to move ahead and kill the Robbers while collecting the red spheres.

Drag your finger up and down to move your cop and tap on the shoot button to fire on the Robbers. While collecting the points and getting ahead, you will discover the new exciting levels to make more points and beet your friends online. Just, don’t allow the Robbers to pass you through.

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
Fun Action Game
Great Time Killer
Addictive & Engaging Graphics
Smooth Animations
